short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to indicate what browsers you tested your pull request code in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easy for you to provide a visual indication of what browsers you have tested your code in and on what environments you have tested on. You will have the opportunity to choose browsers and environments when you are writing your github pull request description.
